Weddings &
Special Events

Celebrate your special event with opulence

The Hotel Diagonal Barcelona offers you the chance to have the greatest experience on the most important day of your life: your wedding. Located beside the Torre Agbar, our hotel for weddings in Barcelona offers you a unique and incomparable backdrop, which will make your union an unforgettable celebration. Its spacious function halls and excellent service will be the other ingredients in making your celebration incredible.
